{"id":958851783,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5 days, 8 hours","timestamp":1685260179,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"288 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/958851783/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Difference of Number of Distinct Values on Diagonals","memory":"80.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> differenceOfDistinctValues(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        vector<vector<int>> ans;\n        int n = grid.size();\n        int m = grid[0].size();\n\n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {\n            vector<int> row;\n            for(int j=0; j<m; j++) {\n                unordered_map<int,int> tl, rb;\n                for(int r=i-1, c=j-1; r>=0 && c>=0; r--, c--) tl[grid[r][c]]++;\n                for(int r=i+1, c=j+1; r<n && c<m; r++, c++) rb[grid[r][c]]++;\n                int l = tl.size();\n                int r = rb.size();\n                row.push_back(abs(l-r));\n            }\n            ans.push_back(row);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"difference-of-number-of-distinct-values-on-diagonals","has_notes":false}
